response.overview: Steal a car and then trip-out hard into East Van... Darcy Marchinkow, David J. Sukic, and Andre Ferrigno all star in a hilariously funny action-comedy in what it's really like to live in East Van. Hang out and see real people, places and crazy situations that make East Van world famous. Go with the East Van Boyz to a real East Van party, drink booze, have a coke fight, smoke B.C. weed, meet hot chicks... enough said!!!
response.tagline: "It's not just a place.... it's a lifestyle"
response.title: East Van Boyz
